articles.title: Why you need a personal laptop - The Verge
articles.description: Using a work laptop as your personal laptop can seem like a convenient cost-saving measure, especially if you work from home. But experts say that buying a personal laptop is worth the extra cost.
articles.content:
Keeping work and life on one device puts your privacy at risk
